title: ashhssn
text:
Image of myself


An undergraduate at Singapore Institute of Technology pursuing a Bachelor of Science with Honors in Applied Artificial Intelligence.
Work experience includes the involvement in project management, research, prototyping, and software programming.
Projects: - Integrating fundamental Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things, and Microcontroller to existing rehabilitative technology for elderly undergoing physical and cognitive therapy - Research and prototyping using Near-Infrared (NIR) technology to aid in therapy
My area of expertise includes, but not limited to: Python Programming Object-Oriented Programming Machine Learning Data Structures and Algorithms Research

title: My project!
text:
Some projects that I have partake in includes the design of a therapeutical pet robot. I have also worked on a project that involves the integration of fundamental Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things, and Microcontroller to existing rehabilitative technology for elderly undergoing physical and cognitive therapy.
You can read more about my project here: Engaging Rehabilitation






Picture of me presenting


With the theme for Mapletree Challenge 2024 - Sustainability and Innovation, participants can look forward to an exciting line-up of pre-challenge activities, such as business proposition and financial literacy workshops, field trips to solar farms and NParks, and an entrepreneurship forum to prepare them for the Challenge.
The Challenge aims to cultivate: - innovation - sustainability - technology - entrepreneurship
You can read more about my project here: Mapletree Challenge 2024

title: ashhssn
text:
“Each strum brings a wave of comfort, echoing through the strings and resonating within me.”

I’ve always found a unique kind of joy in playing the guitar. It’s not just about the melodies or the rhythms; it’s about the connection that forms between me and the music. Over the years, guitar playing has become more than a hobby—it’s a personal retreat. Whether I’m unwinding after a long day or jamming with friends, the guitar is my constant companion, helping me express feelings that words alone cannot capture.

title: ashhssn
text:
Bowling hobby

“Every time I step into a bowling alley, I feel a rush of excitement.”

Bowling, on the other hand, offers a completely different kind of thrill. It’s about precision, technique, and a bit of competitive spirit. Every time I step into a bowling alley, I feel a rush of excitement. The sound of pins crashing, the strategic choices in each roll, and the camaraderie among teammates make every game a new adventure. Bowling nights are a time to unwind, challenge myself, and most importantly, have a lot of fun with friends and family. Whether I’m aiming for a spare or a strike, each roll is a chance to improve and enjoy the moment.
